TopicTitle: WeCanGame New KSP 1.0 career mode series!!

Articles.Content:
============================================

Greetings!! KSP 1.0 just hit and I couldn't wait to start making videos!

Part 1: basic intro, some how to stuff, and then quite a bit of failure, but I did make it to space!!! getting back.... not so much, but still, space!

I recorded more (like orbit and reentry) but will post those later once I have time to edit. I'm trying to keep vids on the shorter end (under 15 minutes)

Behold!

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vzSKIQvECyg?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

Stay tuned for more!

and if you have suggestions i'd love to hear them. I'm only 2 weeks into making vids and i've gotten lots of help from people already. Keep it coming!

Right off the bat I know the thumnail sucks, I don't know what i'm doing. I'm going to get some software to help (using free stuff now) any suggestions?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-14T05:34:29Z" title="12/14/2015 05:34  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 14, 2015</time> by Rufledt**

Part 2! I finally get into orbit after some screwing around

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RuffviHcP4o?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Thanks! I've been watching you, too! I do have a question, what is written on the shade thing behind you?

Part 3! I send some stuff to the Mun, some of it doesn't explode ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4h9z9CN-5Ws?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I also recorded a manned (Jeb'ed) mission to the mun, will post that after some editing.

Episode 4! Flags and Butt-prints! (watch, it'll make sense)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sCRVvRj00OI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And please I'm open to suggestions/comments, please feel free to leave any!

Episode 5! Rescuing a Kerbal, during a space station launch!!!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XYV7V-qhawk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

This time, i try sending a mission to Duna, despite being entirely unprepared and not having much unlocked. It doesn't go perfectly, I may have missed the planet...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tpArybiiSQk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

New video! I'm being a bit too ambitious for my skill level in career mode! lets build a mothership with 2 landers and satellites for my first manned mission beyond kerbin's SOI!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q0W9gpNBYOU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Uploaded kindof a 'deleted scenes' type episode, taking a look at the ships from episode 7. hope you enjoy!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/h1BkBqA8yvk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T07:15:47Z" title="06/06/2015 07:15  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by Rufledt**
  
oops! the link was wrong!

Duna, Ike, landers, satellites! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gNFoRmslPsc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

New Episode! returning from Duna, things surprisingly don't go as wrong this time:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W9DI6TuzXng?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Finally, we send a mission to eve! A rover anyway. Well, more than one. there \*might\* have been some fatal screw ups in this one.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Dpy1jCSNKik?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

the promised closer look at the eve rover/lander in episode 10.5

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W5YUou_qMDU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Greetings! today i finish some loose ends with my previous eve mission, do a bit of splashdown, and set up for a freebie mission to gilly! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CLK6rS2xSsk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

New episode! (actually really old, but i forgot to post here ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)) 

Today, i land on gilly with an awesome satellite (that's a bit of an exaggeration, actually) that i left in orbit of Eve during my last video!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nv2JaBC4bYY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

New episode!  today, i try to make a mun base! it, uh... didn't, uh... just watch:

Edit: turns out i'm a big dumb, until i figure out how to embed in this new forum, here's just a link: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-gxfU-zw41](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-gxfU-zw41c)
